net.sf.jclec.pso

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractIndividual<double[]>
      • net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayIndividual
        • net.sf.jclec.pso.Particle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IIndividual, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class Particle
extends net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayIndividual
    This class represents solutions as particles to be optimized by a PSO algorithm. It is an specialization of RealArrayIndividual that includes the velocity and memories of the solution.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    RealArrayIndividual, PSOAlgorithm, Serialized Form
